mapper.insert: insert into sky_take_out.dish (name, category_id, price, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, status) values (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{status})
mapper.select:
select d.*,c.name as categoryName from sky_take_out.dish d left join sky_take_out.category c on d.category_id = c.id
and d.name like concat('%',#{d.name},'%')
and d.name like concat('%',#{d.categoryId},'%')
and d.name like concat('%',#{d.status},'%')
order by d.create_time desc;
